item.title: Thesis defense of Thapelo MOSETLHE
item.author: mosetlhethapelo@gmail.com (Home)
item.description: Title : Model-free pressure control in water distribution networks Doctoral School : Information and Communication Sciences and Technologies (STIC) Specialisation : Automation Establishment : Universite Paris-Saclay Graduate School: Informatique et sciences du numérique Research unit : EA 4048 - Laboratoire d’Ingénierie des Systèmes de Versailles This defense took place on Wednesday 03 November 2021.

item.author: mosetlhethapelo@gmail.com (Home)
item.description: PROFESSIONAL APPOINTMENTS TEACHING AND LEARNING EXPERIENCE 1. Senior Lecturer (Jan 2019 - Present) - University of South Africa 2. Doctoral Researcher (Sep 2018 - Nov 2021) - Université Paris-Saclay 3. Post-Graduate Teaching Assistant (Jan 2016 - Jun 2018) - Tshwane University of Technology
